ValidationRule.description: trying to prevent bad or not complete numbers from being manually entered and pushed up to the Account Number. Matches validation rule on Account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c)), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), NOT(AND( REGEX(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9]{4}|[A-Z0-9]{8})"), NOT(REGEX(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9])\\1{2}[A-Z0-9]{1}")), NOT(REGEX(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9])\\1{6}[A-Z0-9]{1}")), NOT(REGEX(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c, "[0-9]+[-](0)\\1{3}[A-Z0-9]{4}")), NOT(REGEX(New_Prospect_Client_Number__c, "[0-9]+[-](NPR)[A-Z0-9]*")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect format for New Prospect-Client Number.
